Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Topping up your GCrypto Trading Wallet means adding funds to your wallet, which you can use to buy cryptocurrency. Ensure you stay within your [GCash Wallet Transaction Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits), and [GCrypto Trading Wallet Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303981320473-What-are-the-transaction-limits-of-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet) to avoid any issues.

### **How to top up your GCrypto Trading Wallet:**

1. On the GCrypto dashboard, tap **Top Up**
2. Enter the amount you wish to top up and tap **Continue**
3. Review your details then tap **Pay**

You'll see a confirmation message once the top-up is successful.

To confirm your GCrypto top-up transactions, check your **GCash App Inbox** and **GCash Transaction History**.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [What is the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303868127897-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)

- [How can I withdraw from my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31304830152089-Withdraw-from-your-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [What are the GCrypto Networks and Fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22747167650201-GCrypto-Networks-and-Convenience-Fees)
